<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Death's Drums](/Feats.aspx?ID=1290) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your life has been spent challenging death itself, and proximity to that implacable foe only makes your heart beat harder. When you are taking [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) or your [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) value is 1 or greater, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saving throws.
name: Death's Drums
